attributes.action: to charge foreign registered cars to buy road tax
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i live in southamton where you see lots of polish registered cars. some have been in this country a few years. they don't pay road tax, parking penalties and have no mot. i was told that they can buy polish mot for less than £50. has the govt got any register of how many such cars are there on our roads. i don't think so. i propose that the govt make them pay for road tax at point of entry and keep a register of all cars registered abroad.
